Module financial_news_sentiment.exceptions

Base exceptions for the financial news sentiment analysis system.

class APIError(BaseAppException):
    """Raised when there is an error in API operations."""

    pass

class BaseAppException (message: str, component: str | None = None, details: Any | None = None)
Expand source code 
class BaseAppException(Exception):
    """Base exception class for all application-specific exceptions."""

    def __init__(
        self,
        message: str,
        component: Optional[str] = None,
        details: Optional[Any] = None,
    ) -> None:
        """Initialize the base exception.

        Args:
            message: Human-readable error message
            component: Name of the component where the error occurred
            details: Additional error details (can be dict, list, etc.)
        """
        self.message = message
        self.component = component or "unknown"
        self.details = details
        super().__init__(self.message)

Base exception class for all application-specific exceptions.

Initialize the base exception.

Args

message
Human-readable error message
component
Name of the component where the error occurred
details
Additional error details (can be dict, list, etc.)

Ancestors

  • builtins.Exception
  • builtins.BaseException
